name: Rome - Dashboard UI Kit (Lite)
description:
250+ components & 30 templates for desktop & mobile apps. Powered by clean and trendy custom guidelines and DM Sans font (OFL). Customizable & Adjustable dashboard library crafted in Figma. Equipped with ready-to-use app layouts. You can modify them or use as it is to save time and human resources.

Product highlights:

  • Components-driven architecture based on 250+ components in Figma. Auto-layout and Variants.
  • Organized and well-named UI kit. Color & text styles, constraints, fine layer names, and proper order.
  • Styled and detailed Dashboard library to save time, money, and human resources
  • Contains 30 ready-to-use and properly resizing application templates paginated into 10 popular categories: Analytics, Calendar, Crypto, Ecommerce, Inputs, Kanban, Messenger, Sales, Search, Tables. More to come...
